query: Comprehensive quantum computing landscape survey 2024-2025. Context: $50M investment decision, board-level presentation. Goal: Assess technology readiness, key players, timeline to practical utility. Coverage: 1) Hardware platforms (superconducting, trapped ion, photonic, neutral atom), 2) Software/algorithms, 3) Error correction progress, 4) Commercial applications, 5) Key players (IBM, Google, IonQ, Rigetti, governments), 6) FTQC timeline projections, 7) Investment trends. Success criteria: 3+ authoritative sources per area, quantitative data, 2024-2025 focus. Prioritize: Nature, Science, IEEE, arxiv, company whitepapers, analyst reports (Gartner, McKinsey).
